products.title: Rift Softshade Sand Day And Night Blind
products.description: Keep your interior looking light and bright with the rift softshade sand day and night roller blind. Boasting a design of alternating cream fabric and voile strip panels you can enjoy more versatility with your window covering. This design allows for privacy with plenty of natural light, or you can close the blind completely for increased shading when required. Product id: db-vrbx1879 fabric colour: sand material: 100% polyester headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white brackets control type: smooth continuous-looped chain energy saving rating: er1 - lowest energy saving value - due to blind type or fabric light filtering: yes rift softshade sand day and night blind in cream.
